feature1.explanation: Both texts use similar punctuation styles including commas, parentheses, and colons.

feature2.explanation: There is consistency in lexical and grammatical features with formal language use.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structures are coherent and well-organized in both texts.

feature4.explanation: Text and discourse features show a similarity in formal tone and professional style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Based on the analysis of the five features, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
